FuncDef:
The direct-route track degrade-cost command associates the cost of direct routes with the interface's status.
The undo direct-route track command deletes the association between the cost of direct routes and the interface's status.
By default, the cost of direct routes is not associated with the interface's status, and the default direct route cost is 0.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the cost of direct routes on the interface.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To associate the cost of direct routes with the interface's status, run the direct-route track degrade-cost command.
